Montgomery Transport, LLC. Sponsored We know you’re made to go further; take your Class A flatbed driving career there with our extended training program! With a valid CDL-A and at least one-year OTR experience, you can train the Montgomery way. Our two-week training program sets you up for success as a flatbed company truck driver! ⭐️ NEW PAY INCREASE! Starting at $.51 CPM (at 6 months = $.52 & at 1 year $.53) ⭐️ Path to Success Pay = Up to $3,600 in first 120 days! ⭐️ One Week of in-class orientation and hands on training + One week of OTR Training with driver trainer ⭐️ Weekly Home Time: guaranteed 34 but averaging 46-53 hours! ⭐️ Top-of-the-line equipment averaging 1.7 years old Requires successful completion of road test, load securement and tarp testing, trainer & trainee must load a list of specific commodities.
